name: UMD CS Grade Checker
description: A web scraper that will detect grade changes from a variety of UMD services.

SPARKPOST_DOMAIN.description: Domain that Sparkpost will send from (must be verified).

EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: An email to send grade change notifications to.

UMD_PASSWORD.description: Your UMD Password (Needed to log in to UMD services to perform grade scraping.)
